Class INDISwitchElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • laazotea.indi.driver.INDIElement

  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class INDISwitchElement
extends INDIElement
    A class representing a INDI Switch Element.

    1.11, March 26, 2012
    Author:
    S. Alonso (Zerjillo) [zerjioi at ugr.es]

      • setValue

        public void setValue(java.lang.Object newValue)
              throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Sets the Element value to a new value. This method ensures that if the Switch Property rule is AT_MOST_ONE or ONE_OF_MANY and the new value is ON the other Switch Elements of the property are turn to OFF.
        Specified by:
        setValue in class INDIElement
        Parameters:
        newValue - The new value.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the newValue is not a valid SwitchStatus.
